page.title: 04The Vron Gate Show
page.content: The{Vron Gate Show}is always on a Saturday and always on the first Saturday in August. At the show we have a lot of competitions.The competitions vary from pets to a sewing and knitting competition.We have plant stalls and a very big tent.We have a fancy dress competition too. The side shows vary from a coconut stall to a cattle market.The committee starts arranging the show 3 months before it begins.It starts at 2.00pm and ends at midnight.It is so long because we have the{Vron Gate {Show}supper afterwards. It is a lovely day out for all the family.
